title: At the Library
description: In At the Library, students will read about all the things kids can do at the library. What fun things will they find besides reading and listening to books? Detailed illustrations, high-frequency words, and repetitive phrases support early-emergent readers. Students will have the opportunity to locate details that support the main idea as well as connect to prior knowledge as they read this interesting book.
meta: books, library, listen, read, stories, visit
Connect to prior knowledge to understand text
Main Idea and Details : Identify main idea and details
Initial Consonants : Discriminate initial consonant /L/ sound
High-Frequency Words : Identify and use the high-frequency word can

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
